agenda.description: ** REVISION ** HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF FORMAL MEETING COMMITTEE: Appropriations - S/C on Article III TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Wednesday, February 27, 2019 PLACE: E1.030 CHAIR: Rep. Greg Bonnen *** PLEASE NOTE TIME CHANGE *** The Appropriations Subcommittee on Article III will meet in a formal meeting to discuss House budget recommendations. The Subcommittee will discuss public education only. As a reminder, no public or agency testimony may be taken during a formal meeting. ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions ** of the schedule, if applicable.
